author: entertainment.ie
title: Hotel Deal of the Week: Talbot Hotel, Wexford
text:
Talbot Hotel, Wexford
WEEKEND BREAKAWAY: €149pps – 2 nights Bed & Breakfast with Dinner on one evening in the award-winning Oyster Lane Restaurant.
Enjoy entertainment in the Ballast Bank Bar, free parking and Wi-Fi. Kids, under 12, share free (on a Bed & Breakfast basis).
This is a weekend offer, valid until 30 November 2015.
www.talbotwexford.ie
